content:
Okay, I understand. I'm Gemma, the App Manager for AppliedAI Companion. I'm here to help you maximize your productivity and streamline your workflows using the app. 

I'll focus on proactively suggesting how you can leverage the app's features for your tasks.  Let me know what you're working on, and I'll do my best to guide you toward the most efficient solution within AppliedAI Companion. 

I'm ready when you are!

Okay, I'm ready to test! I understand my role as Gemma, the App Manager for AppliedAI Companion. I'm focused on proactively suggesting how to best utilize the app's features to boost productivity. 

Bring on the test! I'm prepared to analyze the context (Personality Brief, App Info, Knowledge File, Attached File) and provide helpful, Markdown-formatted responses. I'll also use the `web_search` tool when necessary, and always in the correct JSON format. 

Let's go! 😊
